SEARCH
Package user

Class Users

java.lang.Object
user.Users
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Client, Sellers
public class Users extends Object implements Serializable
A class that represents a user of the application.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Users.LoginException
    Thrown to indicate that there was an error during user login.
    class 
    Users.LogoutException
    Thrown to indicate that there was an error during user logout.
    class 
    Users.RegistrationException
    Exception thrown when there is an error during user registration.

  • Constructor Details

    • Users

      public Users()
      Creates a new user with default attributes.

    • Users

      public Users(String username, String password, String name, String surname, String role)
      Creates a new user with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      name - The name of the user.
      surname - The surname of the user.
      role - The role of the user (e.g. client, seller, administrator).

    • register

      public void register() throws Users.RegistrationException
      Registers the user with the given attributes.
      Throws:
      Users.RegistrationException - if there is an error while registering the user.

    • login

      public void login(String username, String password) throws Users.LoginException
      Logs the user in with the given username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      Throws:
      Users.LoginException - if there is an error while logging in the user

    • logout

      public void logout() throws Users.LogoutException
      Logs the user out.
      Throws:
      Users.LogoutException - if there is an error while logging out the user.
